p: VÃ©lez applied dicationic pyrrolidinium and piperidinium ILs with [NTf 2] - anion as electrolytes in lithium batteries [ 78]. Later, a list of imidazolium-, pyridinium-, pyrrolidinium-, and piperidinium-based ILs was used together with a carbon paste electrode to study the electrochemical response of dopamine [ 79], and the results showed that the sizes and types of both cation and anion have an influence on that response.
